name: SHADOW OS (the game)
description:
SHADOW OS orignally from Gamejolt is a game that features Shadow the Hedgehog in its own OS.

SHADOW OS lets you browse the internet, listen to music, play games, and more. But be careful, Shadow the Hedgehog tends to trick you a lot. We also may have secrets for you to discover.

WARNING: Game may contain content that may not be suitable for young children. Recommended for ages 13+.

USEFUL LINKS
